blogitems.title: Blog item 1
blogitems.fulltext: here's where you put the full text of your blog item, ideally this won't be shown unless you click on the item. If it's always showing, I've done something wrong and it broke. Anyway, I am just typing a bunch of stuff here so it can look similar to a regular blog post. BLAH BLAH BLAH
